1.instruction: Create a Product Requirement Document (PRD) for a web-based control interface prototype for 'Sevak' mini tractor. The PRD should include user stories, features for monitoring and controlling the tractor (dashboard with status indicators for cutting, loading, transporting operations), scheduling autonomous operations, manual override controls, battery status display, operational metrics, responsive design for mobile devices, and any additional features that would benefit rural users in India. Save the PRD at '/data/chats/5a397/workspace/docs/sevak_control_interface_prd.json'.

2.instruction: Design the system architecture for the Sevak mini tractor web control interface based on the PRD at '/data/chats/5a397/workspace/docs/sevak_control_interface_prd.json'. Create a system design document that includes component diagrams, data flow, API specifications, and UI wireframes. Save the system design at '/data/chats/5a397/workspace/docs/sevak_control_interface_design.json'.

3.instruction: Develop the web-based prototype for 'Sevak' mini tractor control interface based on the system design at '/data/chats/5a397/workspace/docs/sevak_control_interface_design.json'. Use React, JavaScript and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive web application that simulates controlling the Sevak tractor. Include dashboard views, control panels, operational status displays, scheduling features, and manual override controls. Save the code in the '/data/chats/5a397/workspace/src' directory.
